## Description The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER." The text is in bold, uppercase letters. The logo has a distinctive color scheme with the text "KÄRCHER" in black, set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple yet striking, emphasizing the brand name with high contrast between the black text and the yellow background. # K 5 PREMIUM SMART CONTROL FLEX HOME ## Text Content Mehr Kontrolle: der K 5 Premium Smart Control Flex mit PremiumFlex-Schlauch und G 180 Q Smart Control-Pistole für starke Verschmutzungen rund ums Haus. Inkl. Schlauchtrommel und Home Kit. ## Key-Value Pair Bestell-Nr.: 1.324-735.0 ## Text Content - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung - Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff - Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529177440
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 145 / 2 - max. 14,5
Fördermenge l/h max. 500
Flächenleistung m²/h 40
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 2,1
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 13,5
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 19,8
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 417 × 306 × 584
## Description The image shows a yellow and black pressure washer set, which includes several components: 1. **Pressure Washer Unit**: - The main body is predominantly yellow with black accents. - It has a handle on top for easy maneuverability. - There are wheels at the base for transport. - A hose reel is integrated into the design for convenient storage of the hose. 2. **Accessories**: - **Surface Cleaner Attachment**: - Circular in shape, primarily yellow with black detailing. - Designed for cleaning flat surfaces efficiently. - **Detergent Bottle**: - Contains cleaning solution, labeled with a yellow and black design. - **Spray Lance**: - Black in color, designed to attach to the main unit for directing water flow. The set is designed for outdoor cleaning tasks, such as washing cars, patios, and driveways. The color scheme and design suggest a focus on durability and ease of use. ## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Home Kit Flächenreiniger T 5, Stein- und Fassadenreiniger, 3in1, 1 l
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q Smart Control
Multi Jet 3-in-1 [x]
Integrierte HD-Schlauchtrommel [x]
Integriertes Aufbewahrungsnetz [x]
HD-Schlauch 10 m / PremiumFlex
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Plug 'n' Clean-System
Teleskopgriff [x]
Wassergkühlter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
Wasseransaugung [x]
App-Verbindung per Bluetooth [x]
## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records. ## Description The image is a cropped section from a document, specifically a figure, featuring a bold and prominent design. It includes the following elements: - A large numeral "1" in a light gray color, serving as a background or watermark. - Overlaid on the numeral is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. - Inside the arrow, the text reads: ``` WORLD'S NO. 1 PRESCRIBED GOLIMUMAB BRAND ``` - The text is in uppercase, with "WORLD'S NO. 1" and "PRESCRIBED GOLIMUMAB BRAND" stacked vertically. - The font is bold and black, ensuring high contrast against the yellow background for readability. - The design suggests emphasis on the product's ranking and prescription status, likely for promotional or informational purposes. ## Description The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with a circle of 12 stars, representing the European Union flag. Below the shape, the text reads "Made in Europe." The design suggests that the product or item associated with this logo is manufactured within Europe. The blue color and star arrangement are typical of EU branding, indicating compliance with European standards or origin. ## Description The image is a circular icon with a teal background. In the center, there is a white outline of a smartphone. The smartphone is depicted with a screen and a single button below it. To the right of the smartphone, there are three curved lines, also in white, emanating from the phone. These lines suggest a signal or communication, indicating that the phone is either sending or receiving data. The overall design is simple and uses minimalistic line art to convey the concept of wireless communication or connectivity. ## Description of Figure The image is a cropped section from a document, specifically a figure. It contains the following elements: - **Title**: "LANGLEBIG" - **Symbol**: An hourglass icon is prominently displayed in the center. The hourglass is yellow against a black background, suggesting a theme of time or longevity. - **Text**: Below the hourglass, there is a line of text: "AUSDAUERNDES STÜCK GESCHICHTE". This translates from German to "ENDURING PIECE OF HISTORY", indicating a focus on durability or historical significance. The overall design uses contrasting colors (yellow and black) to emphasize the message and symbol. The hourglass is a universal symbol for time, reinforcing the theme of longevity and endurance.

chunks.text:
## Description

The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER." The text is in bold, uppercase letters. The logo has a distinctive color scheme with the text "KÄRCHER" in black, set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple yet striking, emphasizing the brand name with high contrast between the black text and the yellow background.
# K 5 PREMIUM SMART CONTROL FLEX HOME

## Text Content

Mehr Kontrolle: der K 5 Premium Smart Control Flex mit PremiumFlex-Schlauch und G 180 Q Smart Control-Pistole für starke Verschmutzungen rund ums Haus. Inkl. Schlauchtrommel und Home Kit.

## Text Content

- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff
- Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529177440
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 145 / 2 - max. 14,5
Fördermenge l/h max. 500
Flächenleistung m²/h 40
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 2,1
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 13,5
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 19,8
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 417 × 306 × 584

## Description

The image shows a yellow and black pressure washer set, which includes several components:

1. **Pressure Washer Unit**: 
   - The main body is predominantly yellow with black accents.
   - It has a handle on top for easy maneuverability.
   - There are wheels at the base for transport.
   - A hose reel is integrated into the design for convenient storage of the hose.

2. **Accessories**:
   - **Surface Cleaner Attachment**: 
     - Circular in shape, primarily yellow with black detailing.
     - Designed for cleaning flat surfaces efficiently.
   - **Detergent Bottle**:
     - Contains cleaning solution, labeled with a yellow and black design.
   - **Spray Lance**:
     - Black in color, designed to attach to the main unit for directing water flow.

The set is designed for outdoor cleaning tasks, such as washing cars, patios, and driveways. The color scheme and design suggest a focus on durability and ease of use.

## Ausstattung
Feature Details
Home Kit Flächenreiniger T 5, Stein- und Fassadenreiniger, 3in1, 1 l
Hochdruckpistole G 180 Q Smart Control
Multi Jet 3-in-1 [x]
Integrierte HD-Schlauchtrommel [x]
Integriertes Aufbewahrungsnetz [x]
HD-Schlauch 10 m / PremiumFlex
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Plug 'n' Clean-System
Teleskopgriff [x]
Wassergkühlter Motor [x]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
Wasseransaugung [x]
App-Verbindung per Bluetooth [x]

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records.

## Description

The image is a cropped section from a document, specifically a figure, featuring a bold and prominent design. It includes the following elements:

- A large numeral "1" in a light gray color, serving as a background or watermark.
- Overlaid on the numeral is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right.
- Inside the arrow, the text reads:

  ```
  WORLD'S
  NO. 1
  PRESCRIBED
  GOLIMUMAB
  BRAND
  ```

- The text is in uppercase, with "WORLD'S NO. 1" and "PRESCRIBED GOLIMUMAB BRAND" stacked vertically.
- The font is bold and black, ensuring high contrast against the yellow background for readability.
- The design suggests emphasis on the product's ranking and prescription status, likely for promotional or informational purposes.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with a circle of 12 stars, representing the European Union flag. Below the shape, the text reads "Made in Europe." The design suggests that the product or item associated with this logo is manufactured within Europe. The blue color and star arrangement are typical of EU branding, indicating compliance with European standards or origin.

## Description

The image is a circular icon with a teal background. In the center, there is a white outline of a smartphone. The smartphone is depicted with a screen and a single button below it. To the right of the smartphone, there are three curved lines, also in white, emanating from the phone. These lines suggest a signal or communication, indicating that the phone is either sending or receiving data. The overall design is simple and uses minimalistic line art to convey the concept of wireless communication or connectivity.

## Description of Figure

The image is a cropped section from a document, specifically a figure. It contains the following elements:

- **Title**: "LANGLEBIG"
- **Symbol**: An hourglass icon is prominently displayed in the center. The hourglass is yellow against a black background, suggesting a theme of time or longevity.
- **Text**: Below the hourglass, there is a line of text: "AUSDAUERNDES STÜCK GESCHICHTE". This translates from German to "ENDURING PIECE OF HISTORY", indicating a focus on durability or historical significance.

The overall design uses contrasting colors (yellow and black) to emphasize the message and symbol. The hourglass is a universal symbol for time, reinforcing the theme of longevity and endurance.
